name: Add SALESmanago contacts from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new contact to SALESmanago. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1M6Mp2hXhqkMVs1vh3trCLG-43fGjDeYcrguTGN1-kJw/edit?usp=sharing).
